column4: Flash player plug in for Firefox does not work after update were applied.  Already reinstalled it, still does not work. Ideas?
Can play most any video outside of the browser.
from command line run sudo updatedb && locate libflash
should that take a long time to run? it still has not returned to a prompt.
it can take a little bit
its making a index of all the files on your pc
do you have 2 installs of ubuntu or are you installing from a livecd
the /mnt/Ubuntu10/user/ concerns me a little bit.
ok it looks like flash dident take close your web browser. and try to reinstall it
try this from command line sudo apt-get install flashplug-nonfree
it says it is already at the newest version.
try to close your browser and reopen it
try youtube  when you restart it
there is just a black box were the video should be...
